text.section: Any of the foregoing provisions or portions thereof not applicable by reason of the plan of insurance may, to the extent inapplicable, be omitted from the policy.
The insurer shall reserve the right to defer the payment of any cash surrender value for a period of six (6) months after demand therefor with surrender of the policy.

law.history: Amended 2010 Ky. Acts ch. 24, sec. 1182, effective July 15, 2010. -- Amended 1982 Ky. Acts ch. 263, sec. 1, effective July 15, 1982. -- Created 1970 Ky. Acts ch. 301, subtit. 15, sec. 31, effective June 18, 1970.
